relation.text: 6 weeks past with the Gout duri n g
never stirred in an Evening -- he has been for a week
the end of June when thanked
now in a violent longing fit for the Country -- I was interrupted
is gone abroad for a year
went to St. Pauls -- a day
had not recovered the effect of the day a week
begs her best love to you , she talks of bei n g at Courteenhall the first week in June
hope all is well chès vous -- Saturday
